title: Antibodies from earlier exposures affect response to new flu strains

title_detail.value: Antibodies from earlier exposures affect response to new flu strains

summary: Research highlights role of immunological imprinting -- or how the immune system fights the flu after previous exposure to the virus via infections or vaccinations -- in the elicitation of new antibodies.

summary_detail.value: Research highlights role of immunological imprinting -- or how the immune system fights the flu after previous exposure to the virus via infections or vaccinations -- in the elicitation of new antibodies.
